name: Biology Crossing
description:
You are Jillian Banfield, you are trapped in a abandoned town and have to help the cells inhabiting the town to evolve.

Think animal crossing buit instead of animals its cells. Collect DNA by helping cells and exploring to pay "Nook Cell" to evolve.

Controls: W,A,S,D or arrow keys for movement. Space to interact.

We used pre purchased assets for the enviroment and character, but cells animations particle effects ect were creating by us during the jam.
